document_data.title: Jungle Hunt
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Jungle Hunt''''' is an adventure in the [[Living Forgotten Realms]] organized play campaign for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 4{{th}} edition.

{{Quote|''A great hunt has been called in the jungles of Chult. The Amnian trading costers of Port Nyanzaru are competing to see which one can bring in the biggest, rarest beasts as trophies, and they're looking for adventuring companies to do the hunting. Are you and your companions up to the challenge? A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Chult for characters levels 1–14.''}}

Index.Items: :{{P|''[[amulet of resolution]]''|52,54}} • {{P|''[[lucky charm]]''|52,54}} • {{P|''[[onslaught arrow]]''|8,52,54-55}} • {{P|''[[periapt of cascading health]]''|52,54}} • {{P|''[[steadfast amulet]]''|52,54}}
